entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 34 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
